text.more: Created by Christopher Roberts with data published by Dimensions.ai that contains all 2020 articles and preprints from the Dimensions.ai database related to COVID-19.  Data extracted in BigQuery, analyzed with the metaknowledge package in Python, and deployed using Gephi.
text.intro: For the 20 most-cited COVID-19 publications in 2020, this network graph represents co-authorship linkages. Darker colors represent fewer steps to author Song Jingdong.
text.title: Co-author Distance to Song Jingdong in Top 20 Cited COVID-19 Publications
